triples.name: Echo chamber (media)
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes echo chamber formation and effects across social media platforms, proposing new comparative analysis methodology.

triples.name: Social media
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes information dynamics across major social media platforms to understand echo chamber effects.

triples.name: Homophily
triples.relevance: The paper measures homophily in user interaction networks as a key dimension of echo chamber analysis.

triples.name: Diffusion of innovations
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes information diffusion bias toward like-minded peers as a critical factor in echo chamber dynamics.

triples.name: Facebook
triples.relevance: The paper conducts comparative analysis of echo chambers on Facebook against other platforms like Reddit.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes information dynamics and echo chamber formation on Twitter as one of the main platforms studied.

triples.name: Reddit
triples.relevance: The paper compares news consumption and segregation patterns on Reddit versus Facebook.

triples.name: Gab (social network)
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes echo chamber and homophily effects on Gab as one of four major platforms examined.
